title: KHR_materials_sheen glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the sheen material model.

sheenColorFactor.description: Color of the sheen layer (in linear space).

sheenTexture.description: The sheen color (RGB) and roughness (Alpha) texture. Stored in channel RGB the sheen color in sRGB transfer function and in A the linear factor.
sheenTexture.short_description: The sheen color (RGB) and roughness (Alpha) texture.

sheenRoughnessFactor.description: The sheen layer roughness of the material.
